description:
Remote position- preferable in PA area but not required. This role will be 30 hours a week, some weeks might require 40 hours.

Soft Skills: Understands cyber security, attention detail.

Education: BA in cyber security or in process of getting it.

Years of experience: 0-2 years

Responsibilities

This is a role well suited to an ambitious professional, looking for the next step in their career. As a Cybersecurity Analyst, you will be responsible for:

  • Analyze our products’ cybersecurity features
  • Discuss and answer questions about cybersecurity with our customers
  • Coordinate with experts on answering customer cybersecurity questions
  • Produce customer asset analyses for use in asset planning sessions

This position may suit you best if you are familiar with what is below, and would like to develop your career

  • You have a strong interesting in starting your career in cybersecurity.
  • You have a good understanding of networking and cybersecurity concepts, such as VPNs, vlans, AD/LDAP, firewalls, encryption, whitelisting.
  • You will be working with a broad range of technology and therefore you are willing to learn about new software and hardware solutions
  • Since you are interacting with customers, excellent English skills (ideally as native language, spoken and written) are necessary
  • Ability to work well in a team, strong communication skills and customer orientation

Required skills to have for the success of this role

  • Personal or professional experience with networking and/or Windows system administration
  • Must feel comfortable working in a fully virtual environment
  • Must have permanent work authorization
